S02mpvv_u:3_0: śuciḥ samāhitaḥ san balyādikaṃ dattvā nirmuṣṭihastapramāṇāṃ bhūrjatvacaṃ vastraṃ vā samādāya prathamaṃ tāvac caturaṅgulapramāṇaṃ puṭam ekaṃ likhet /
S02mpvv_u:4_0: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare dhārakasya rakṣaṃ śāntipuṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ 2 phaṭ 2 svāhā //
S02mpvv_u:5_1: / tatra prathame puṭe mantram oṃ maṇītipūrvakam eva /
